scripts.db:types:gen: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > packages/supabase/types/supabase.types.ts
scripts.db:migrate: npx supabase migration up --include-all && pnpm run db:types:gen
scripts.db:reset: dotenv -e .env -- npx supabase db reset && pnpm db:types:gen && pnpm seed
scripts.test:integration: dotenv -e .env -- vitest run --config tests/supabase/vitest.config.mts && pnpm -r run test:integration
scripts.test:integration:coverage: dotenv -e .env -- vitest run --config tests/supabase/vitest.config.mts && pnpm -r run test:integration:coverage
